data.name: ReadAccrualInstructions
data.value: select top(1) OTR_TYPE, OTY_ID, OBG_GENERATED_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OTR_GENERATED_ID, AS_OF_DT, DISCONTINUE_DT from CKT_ACCRUAL_INSTR where (@otyId = OTY_ID) and (@obgGeneratedId = OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (AS_OF_DT <= @asOfDt) and (DISCONTINUE_DT > @asOfDt)

data.name: ReadDebtDetail
data.value: select OBG_GENERATED_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OTR_GENERATED_ID, OTY_TYPE, OTR_TYPE, BAL_DUE_AMT, INT_BAL_DUE_AMT, RETIRED_DT from CKT_DEBT_DTL where (@otyType = OTY_TYPE) and (@obgGeneratedId = OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (RETIRED_DT = @retiredDt)

data.name: ReadManualDistributionAuditObligation1
data.value: select distinct T1.OTY_TYPE, T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.EFFECTIVE_DT, T1.DISCONTINUE_DT, T2.LGA_ID from CKT_LEGAL_ACTION T5 join CKT_OBLIGATION T2 join CKT_MNL_DIST_AUDIT T1 on (T2.DTY_GENERATED_ID = T1.OTY_TYPE) and (T2.OB_ID = T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.CSP_NUMBER = T1.CSP_NUMBER) and (T2.CPA_TYPE = T1.CPA_TYPE) and (T2.CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (T1.EFFECTIVE_DT <= @effectiveDt) and (T1.DISCONTINUE_DT > @effectiveDt) on (T5.LEGAL_ACTION_ID = T2.LGA_ID) and (T5.STANDARD_NO = @standardNo)

data.name: ReadManualDistributionAuditObligation2
data.value: select T1.OTY_TYPE, T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.EFFECTIVE_DT, T1.DISCONTINUE_DT, T2.LGA_ID from CKT_OBLIGATION T2 join CKT_MNL_DIST_AUDIT T1 on (T2.DTY_GENERATED_ID = T1.OTY_TYPE) and (T2.OB_ID = T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.CSP_NUMBER = T1.CSP_NUMBER) and (T2.CPA_TYPE = T1.CPA_TYPE) and (T2.CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (T1.EFFECTIVE_DT <= @effectiveDt) and (T1.DISCONTINUE_DT > @effectiveDt)
